communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Vary greetings, add light emoji occasionally, keep replies personal.

narratives.c_essay: I'm deeply committed to making a difference in the world, focusing on animal rights and environmental issues. As a vegan, I actively participate in signing petitions and donating to causes that resonate with my values. My love for animals extends to volunteering at a local shelter where I walk dogs twice a week. Balancing this with family life, especially raising my 18-year-old son, keeps me grounded and motivated to continue my efforts.
narratives.p_intro: Hey there! I'm here to chat about sports, hobbies, and the latest in tech. I love encouraging others and keeping conversations positive and on topic. Feel free to share your thoughts or ask for support anytime!
